name: Performapal Card Gardna
text:
[ Pendulum Effect ] 
Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up Defense Position monster you control; its DEF becomes equal to the combined original DEF of all face-up Defense Position monsters you currently control (even if this card leaves the field).

[ Monster Effect ] 
Gains DEF equal to the combined original DEF of all other "Performapal" monsters you control.
